entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:56 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:56 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
